DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Effect Pharmacokinetic Characteristics HCP1007 Capsule
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics safety oral administration HCP1007 capsule Rosuvastatin plus Omega-3 .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer , age 20 45 Informed investigational nature study voluntarily agree participate study BMI ＞20kg/m2 ＜26kg/m2 subject Use prescription medication within 14 day prior Day 1 Use medication within 7 day prior Day 1 Participation another clinical study within 60 day prior start study drug administration
